feed__home__intro: If you're looking for an escape from the typical social media experience, you've come to the right place. This is Swatchity, the social media app where you can ONLY post colors!
feed__liked__intro: You liked these Swatches, like, a lot. So, now we, like, put them in a feed for you. Like, Wow!
feed__featured__intro: Beep. Boop. The algorithm has selected these Swatches for your scrolling pleasure. Boop. Beep.
feed__mood__intro: Some colors are just a mood, you know?
feed__search__intro: We dug up some Swatches that are close to the color you picked. To search again, just click on the color to pick a new one.
feed__profile__intro: This is the Swatchity user profile for {name}. Join the colorful characters on Swatchity.com today!
search__no_results: We found no results matchng your search color. Please try again.
page_meta__profile__metadesc: Update your profile here. Change your avatar and add your bio. Get colorful!
profile_edit__bio__explainer: Use the color buttons below like a keyboard to write your bio. Click X on a color to remove it. Tap OK to save your bio and CANCEL to, well, cancel.
profile_edit__avatar__explainer: Click on the color tiles to change the colors in your avatar. Click on the buttons on either side of the avatar to change the pattern. More patterns are unlocked when you raise your level by posting more Swatches!
profile_edit__save__error: There was an error saving your profile. Please try again later.
feed__liked__not_logged_in: Howdy! Since you are not logged in, you cannot see Swatches you have liked. That seems logical, right?
swatch__thread__no_replies: Be the first to reply to this swatch!
user_level_up: Congrats! You have leveled up! Keep posting.
alerts__intro: Hey! Something important happened and we need your attention.
alerts__not_logged_in: You need to be logged into Swatchity to view your alerts.
messages__intro: Connect with fellow Swatchers. To start a conversation, go to your friend's profile page and click on the message button.
messages__not_logged_in: You need to be logged into Swatchity to view your messages.
messages__thread__no_messages: There are no messages between you and this user currently. Start a conversation by clicking on the message button!
